LOVE THIS GAME VALVE

If you're a decent FPS player and love games with a ranking or level system, then you should stay away from this game. The game itself is better than anything you'll find, but Vavle has made disastrous changes where they put players in charge of team balancing and a votekick system.

Far too many times I've spent an hour on a single map only to have an envious F2P Player initiate a votekick to get you out. As always there will be other jumping on that bandwagon and click Yes to kick you, leading to you not getting any XP for the time you spent on the map.

Valve is focusing on the wrong things, instead of opening up for people to ruin a game night they should start doing something about the verbal insults that is now infesting the game.

Until Valve introduces ways to stop this kind of abuse, I cannot recommend this game to anyone. Despite me having 1300 hours ingame time.

Эта игра это то, на что я потратил почти большую часть своего адекватного состояния и времени. В ней я нашел некоторую аркаду, увлечение, друзей и хобби. Это то, что мне нравится. Конечно, то, как ведут себя разработчики по отношению к ней неприемлемо и заслуживает укора, так как это неадекватно с каждым годом обещать все больше и больше разных дополнений, а в итоге делать ухучшения игры, вместо ее улучшения. Надеюсь, что в будущем игру улучшат. Хотя надежда - удел дураков, но что я, обычный игрок, имеющий опыт только в C++ может сделать?

Team fortress 2 (TF2) is a FPS released 2007. From that year, they have added updates, maps, cosmetics and weapons. The thing that makes the game so special is the cartoony style and the classes with personality. The game is really fun, both on valve servers and community servers. The maps are complex and the weapons are different. There is so much you need to learn like rocket jumping, game sense, predictions of the players around you and awareness. It is really hard to get good at the game cause of the high, high skill ceiling. The community can be nice and helpful, but also well, not nice. There is many modes, there is the core gamemodes like captur the flag and payload. And there is alternative ones like pass time and payload race, all have different cool maps and mechanics. You can download the game for free, but if you wanna play competetive and trade, you need to buy something from the mann co store, and yes. The game has a economy, meaning if you wanna be successful, buy some nice hats. The game is really solid and fun, but there is no game without bugs and glitches. So if you like throwing base balls at heavy russians with the cat in the hat's hat then this is the game for you mate!

This game is a must-buy for all of you gamers who are seeking a fast paced action game with a slow paced sniper class. Now I dont reccomend multiplayer right away for starters because people can have upgraded weapons and they will beat the sh*t out of you! I had to learn that the hard way lmao.

Anyways this game is very fun and the starter packs are so cheap on the sale. Most of them are around $30 and now their like $3. Honestly Sniper class is my favorite and the starter pack for him is SO worth it. I just love the feeling of getting endless headshots and crits because a lot of the classes are short ranged. Set up a nice little camp and your one of the most op classes in the game. Heavy can barely touch you, pyro is super short range, scout will take a bit to get to you, ect.. The only real class you have to worry about is soldier. The RPG will f*ck you up boi. But anyways F2P is fun and all but you only get the maximum experience when you get to have all of these cool modifications. This is one of those games that have that system like Roblox where you can buy stuff from the Man Co. store but in this game you can also find random drops. Its not P2W. But it makes it a lot more fun.

Sniper class is really good for MvM too because of the explosive headshots thing! It is so op its like on of the best classes. Its a big crowd control in MvM. YOu dont really ever hear of a Sniper being "Crowd Control" very often do you? Well this game has it all! The graphics make this game suprisingly a lot more enjoyable. Almost any computer can run this game super well. And most of all... ITS FREE!!! 

Who doesnt want this amazing game with customizations, 9 mercenary like classes (I think theres 9 idk). Co - op MvM and multiplayer. I mean just come on. Its one of the best games I have ever seen for a price like this. If you see peoples Steam library almost EVERYONE has this game. Its just so cool that this game offers so much! This is definitaly a must play!
